name: DGI Apparel
headline: Expedia for ordering blank apparel
description: DGI Apparel is a one-stop shop for custom screen printers to purchase all of the supplies needed to operate their business. DGI enables users to connect their existing vendor accounts to compare prices, inventory, and shipping time across all of their vendors on a single website. They can also manage all of their vendor carts, checkout, and view purchase tracking and analytics right from DGI.

founders.name: Ian Hinkley, Founder
founders.description: I'm from Raleigh, NC and went on to earn a double major in Mechanical Engineering and Business with a concentration in Entrepreneurship from MIT. I was a 4-year starter on the Men's Basketball Team where I hold the career 3-point record. I was a screenprinter all through high school and am extremely passionate about the custom apparel industry. I was an EPM at Tesla and co-founder of Opdefi before starting DGI.

founders.name: Grant Fuhr, Founder
founders.description:
Grant is Co-Founder and CTO of DGI Apparel. 

Previously a software engineer at Datadog building distributed systems. MIT CS 2021

founders.name: Daniel Shkreli, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of DGI Apparel, a modern shopping experience for custom apparel shops. Technically technical but user-focused. From the Bronx.

"I no longer visit each individual supplier to place my blank garment orders - I rely completely on DGI. It saves me time (lots of time) and money. DGI has changed the industry."
![Big Frog of the Upper West Side logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/big_frog_logo.svg)
###### Kerry

New York, NY
"It's so amazing and our ordering person has been singing praises all week. So awesome!!"
![Imagination Athletics logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/imagination_athletics_logo.svg)
###### Richard
Owner, Imagination Athletics
Conway, SC
"Absolutely LOVE this platform for my ordering needs! This has cut our ordering time in half and makes it super easy to train new hires on ordering! Thanks DGI :)"

Sulphur Springs, TX
"Big time saver and money saver. I consider DGI a must have if you are purchasing apparel from multiple suppliers."
![Big Frog of San Marcos logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/big_frog_logo.svg)

San Marcos, CA

![Green Tee Promos logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/green_tee_promos_logo.svg)
###### Laura

Longmont, CO
"DGI offers a concise and well put together solution for a problem that I had previously thought was unavoidable. Major props to the team for identifying a weak spot in our industry, designing a well made solution, AND OFFERING IT FOR FREE."
![Danger Press logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/danger_press_logo.svg)
###### Jordan
Account Manager, Danger Press
Atlanta, GA
"This platform is amazing! If you are using the major suppliers and not using this tool, you are missing a great opportunity!"
![Big Frog of Shorewood logo](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/big_frog_logo.svg)
###### Gail
Owner, Big Frog of Shorewood
Shorewood, IL
With the most extensive catalog in the industry, you'll never have to visit another site.
Join the 2,500+ other shops using DGI today!
See How It Works
### Questions?
### We've got answers
Is DGI Apparel compatible with my suppliers?
**DGI Apparel supports most of the major apparel suppliers in the United States.** You'll be able to see which supplier accounts you can add once you sign up. If you have any questions, give us a call at +1(919)-495-7693.
Is DGI Apparel a distributor? Is it a buying group?
**DGI Apparel is neither a distributor, nor a buying group.** We don't buy and resell products, and we don't negotiate deals on behalf of our members. DGI is a purchasing platform that helps shops order smarter and easier from the suppliers they already use. You still qualify for all supplier promotions and rebates through your suppliers.
Do I change who I order from?
**Of course not! You keep your suppliers and relationships.** DGI is a purchasing tool that brings all of your existing suppliers into one platform to make purchasing faster and easier. You still order from the suppliers you know and trust, with the same pricing, shipping, billing, and support you're used to. Your reps will still receive their commissions and your relationships with them will not be impacted at all. When you use DGI, the only thing that really changes is your shopping experience - which becomes a whole lot better!
Will I still get my negotiated, GPO, or corporate pricing?
**DGI Apparel supports all special pricing,** including buying group deals, corporate group negotiated deals, and special pricing provided by your representatives. Once you add your supplier account to DGI, your special pricing with that supplier will automatically be reflected on DGI. You'll still qualify for rebates, promotions, and loyalty programs with your suppliers, too!
Why is DGI Apparel free?
**The goal of DGI Apparel is to empower custom apparel shops - not profit from them.** This website is a passion project that stemmed from knowing first-hand the pain of managing several different supplier accounts. Today, we're excited to have suppliers that pay to list on the site, as well as a premium tier for large shops so that we can continue to keep the core functionality of DGI free. We will NEVER charge a shop to connect their suppliers and start purchasing on DGI.
Do I have to add my supplier accounts to use DGI Apparel?
**Yes, you must add your supplier accounts to use DGI.** Suppliers charge different prices to each shop, even for the exact same items. Pricing you see on each supplier's website is specific to your shop, depending on whether you're part of a GPO or have negotiated a particular pricing tier with your rep. By adding your supplier accounts, DGI can display your shop's own unique prices and local stock information while you shop, and allows you to place orders with your suppliers.
![FAQ Headshots](https://d34c0c1in94n75.cloudfront.net/faq_headshots.svg)
#### Still have questions?
###### Get answers directly from the DGI Team.
Chat with the team
OR
Schedule a free demo

generated_description:
### Overview of DGI Apparel

**Company Name:** DGI Apparel  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W24  
**Website:** [dgiapparel.com](https://www.dgiapparel.com)

#### Mission
DGI Apparel aims to be the *Expedia for ordering blank apparel*. Their mission is to streamline the purchasing process for custom screen printers, making it easier for them to manage their supply needs from a variety of vendors.

#### What They Do
Originally starting as a one-stop shop for custom screen printers, DGI Apparel has evolved into a purchasing platform that connects users to their existing vendor accounts. This allows them to:

- Compare prices, inventory, and shipping times across multiple vendors.
- Manage vendor carts, check out, and track purchases‚Äîall from one interface.
  
The platform is designed to save users time and reduce the hassle of ordering by consolidating all supplier information into a single site. This innovative approach addresses a critical pain point in the custom apparel industry.

#### Testimonials
Users have praised DGI Apparel for its efficiency and ease of use. Here are a few highlights from customer feedback:

- **Ed, Operations Manager, Thread Mob Custom Apparel:** "DGI Apparel has transformed how we order blank apparel. It's a game changer!"
- **Sharon, Owner, UME Custom Embroidery:** "DGI saves me time (lots of time) and money. It has changed the industry."
- **Laura, Owner, Green Tee Promos:** "Major props to the team for identifying a weak spot in our industry and offering it for free."

#### Features
DGI Apparel offers an extensive catalog, claiming to be the most comprehensive in the industry. Users can:

- Link existing supplier accounts for tailored pricing.
- Retain all relationships with current suppliers‚ÄîDGI does not act as a distributor or buying group.
- Enjoy the core functionality for free, with optional premium features for larger shops.

#### Conclusion
DGI Apparel is redefining how businesses in the custom apparel space order supplies. By providing a user-friendly platform that aggregates vendor information and supports existing relationships, they're solving a significant logistical challenge for their customers. Whether you're a small shop or a larger entity, DGI Apparel offers an efficient solution that could transform your ordering process.
